About the Company: Zee News Ltd operates news, current affairs and entertainment channels.The company operates a range of regional channels namely Zee Marathi, Zee Bangla, Zee Punjabi, Zee Gujarati, Zee Telugu, Zee Kannada.Under the news segment, ZNL runs channels like Zee News, Zee Business, Zee 24 Taas, the first 24-hour Marathi news channel and 24 Ghanta, a 24 hour Bangla news channel.The company also supplies content to the international broadcasting business of Zee that is located in USA, Europe, Africa, Middle East and Asia Pacific.The Company has an arrangement with Zee Turner to distribute their pay channels bouquet on DTH platforms in India and neighbouring countries.They also have an arrangement with Dish TV India for up-linking of their channels through the Dish TV teleport.
